text: 1.2: Kor 4.17; 2 T 2.3Ŋka vhɨra kha gavar wari won mbiga hɨrɨɨŋ Apia ndi mbai. Arkipus, ana vhɨra nza phorgap nza Fhe Bakɨmen ntara mbui gumgi kav, nza ana nzuav shogi. Nza ana nzuav kherav, nza vhɨra kha gava ndim, mba guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, mbe ndu phenan phogi ga vhui, nza vhɨra kha gavar mbe ndi mbai.
